name: Bitcoin Design Guide Illustrations (work-in-progress, only by me)
description:
The Bitcoin Design Guide is a free, open-source community resource for designers, developers and others working on non-custodial bitcoin products.


This my work-in-progress file for various illustrations for the guide. You are welcome to use as you desire. Ideally we can all chip in and build on each others creative ideas and output to do fantastic work. If this is useful to you, I'd love to hear about it.


More about the Bitcoin Design Community and the Bitcoin Design Guide.


Jan 11, Mar 29, May 14, Jun 17, Oct 1 2021

Various additional illustrations and refinements.


Nov 16, 2020

Published update with various new graphics and better organization.
